item.title: Convert MySQL Dump to Routines Files [PHP script]
item.description: Perhaps you are like me and… well… didn’t get righteous about backuping up your MySQL routines to an SCM until your first database scare? If you did, you’d wish you could just take that database export script from PHPMyAdmin and parse / convert it to a bunch of tidy little Procedure, Function, and Trigger files. Why, that would be nice! The following PHP script (PHP 5+) will do the following:
